skyproc

Class PERK

  • java.lang.Object
    • skyproc.Record
      • skyproc.MajorRecord
        • skyproc.MajorRecordNamed
          • skyproc.MajorRecordDescription
            • skyproc.PERK
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PERK
extends MajorRecordDescription
    A record fully describing and specifying a perk, including level up perks, as well as more obscure hidden perks related to quests and NPCs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
